entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few rain showers early this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 7 April 2023
